org.apache.geode.cache30

Class ClientServerTestCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.geode.test.dunit.internal.JUnit4DistributedTestCase
      • org.apache.geode.test.dunit.cache.internal.JUnit4CacheTestCase
        • org.apache.geode.cache30.ClientServerTestCase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.apache.geode.test.dunit.cache.internal.CacheTestFixture, org.apache.geode.test.dunit.internal.DistributedTestFixture

    public abstract class ClientServerTestCase
extends org.apache.geode.test.dunit.cache.internal.JUnit4CacheTestCase
    Provides helper methods for testing clients and servers. This test case was created by refactoring methods from ConnectionPoolDUnitTest into this class.
    Since:
    GemFire 4.2.1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getMaxThreads

        protected int getMaxThreads()

        this method creates a client connection pool and configures it. If the ports array is not empty it is used to configure the client pool. Otherwise the pool is configured to use the dunit locator.

      • createBridgeServer

        public void createBridgeServer(org.apache.geode.test.dunit.VM vm,
                               java.lang.String rName,
                               int port)
        Create a server that has a value for every key queried and a unique key/value in the specified Region that uniquely identifies each instance.
        Parameters:
        vm - the VM on which to create the server
        rName - the name of the Region to create on the server
        port - the TCP port on which the server should listen
